-- | Render Instrument Chords
--   
--   Library to generate musical instrument manipluations
@package instrument-chord
@version 0.1.0.9

module Music.Instrument.Chord
renderGuitarConcept :: NewNotes a => Bool -> ControlAnnotation -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> [Note] -> a -> Int -> Int -> Bool -> Bool -> [[Bool]] -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> Bool -> [[String]]
standardTuning :: [Note]
dropD :: [Note]
data ControlAnnotation
AnnotateNote :: ControlAnnotation
AnnotatePositionVertical :: ControlAnnotation
AnnotatePositionHorizontal :: ControlAnnotation
AnnotateMarking :: ControlAnnotation
renderPianoConcept :: NewNotes a => Int -> ControlAnnotation -> a -> String
ukelele :: [Note]
lightChord :: [[Bool]]
powerChord :: [[Bool]]
fifthChord :: Note -> [Note]
findPositionPatterns :: NewNotes a => Bool -> a -> [Note] -> Int -> Bool -> Bool -> [[Bool]] -> Bool -> Bool -> [[[[[Int]]]]]
getPositionPatternRange :: Ord c => [[c]] -> (c, c)
sus2 :: NewNotes a => a -> [Note]
sus4 :: NewNotes a => a -> [Note]
chordToScale :: Chord -> NewScale
slash :: Note -> Chord -> NewChord
